cn.domob.android.ads

类 InterstitialAd

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.domob.android.ads.InterstitialAd

  • public class InterstitialAd
extends java.lang.Object

    A class for invoking Domob interstitial ads.

    Calls and displays interstitial ads through invoking this class.。

    • 嵌套类概要
